resources.string: The app gets data from a .Json file and converts the data into ParliamentMembers objects. In Favourites tab you can see all the parliament members you have liked in a list. You can also click them to open up a new tab that has the same info about them differently formatted. In "Pms" you can see a list of all the Pms with no additional info, but if you click the Names or Images, you can see additional info about the selected parliament member.
Welcome to the Parliament Members app!
